attributes.action: Anyone from the age of 11yrs+ found carrying a knife gets 1 year in prison and get educated about knife crime
attributes.additional_details: To teach teenagers about the consequenses of carrying a knife and that there is no need to carry one. Also to try and stop the amount of gang crime in the UK. If someone is old enough to carry a knife they are old enough to deal with the consequences. It is also important that they get taught about knife crime tomake them realise that it is bad.
